00038 NxVec3 Separation::Execute(AgentInfoPtr aInfo)
00039 {
00040         
00041         NxVec3 distance(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00042         NxVec3 distanceSum(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00043         float w = 1.0f;
00044         // iterate through the agents
00045         NiTListIterator it = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetHeadPos();
00046         for (int i=0; i<GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetSize(); i++)
00047         {
00048                 AgentPtr agent = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().Get(it);
00049                 AgentInfoPtr otherAgent = agent->GetController()->GetAgentInfo();
00050                 // if the other agent is this agent then skip it
00051                 if (otherAgent == aInfo)
00052                 {
00053                         it = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetNextPos(it);
00054                         continue;
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 // if the other agent is in the local neighborhood
00058                 distance = aInfo->m_vPos - otherAgent->m_vPos;
00059                 if (distance.magnitude() <= m_fcKNeighborhood)
00060                 {
00061                         // increase number of agents found
00062                         w += 1.0f;
00063                         // increase the sum of distances
00064                         distanceSum += distance / distance.magnitudeSquared();
00065                 }
00066                 it = GameManager::Get()->GetAgents().GetNextPos(it);
00067         }
00068 
00069         // desired velocity points away from the center of mass
00070         aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = m_fcKSeparation * distanceSum / w;
00071         aInfo->m_vOrientation = aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00072         aInfo->m_vOrientation.normalize();
00073 
00074         if (aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity.magnitude() > aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity)
00075         {
00076                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = aInfo->m_vOrientation * aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity;
00077         }
00078 
00079         return aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00080         
00081 }
